selected_quotes: Congrats, Karl Henrik Sivesind and colleagues with a new book on public and private welfare services in Scandinavia
Congratulation, Karl Henrik Sivesind with the new book, comparing private and public education and health care
Karl Henrik Sivesind prsenting his new book at the Autonomous University of Barcelona today.
